Summary: red-orange lights, more than 100 scattered going across sky, some together, some not
trends: There have been no other sightings in Avondale
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsTraveling home on N Rt 41 in the Avondale area saw these lights going across sky, many people also saw them and stopped along side of the road. They were going fast (good speed) To many to be airplanes we thought, thought it was a weird sight I have a pix of one of the lights, but do not have my phone with me to download.
